argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | grpcl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpinvex.p | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_mndideu | |- ( G e. Mnd -> E! u e. B A. x e. B ( ( u .+ x ) = x /\ ( x .+ u ) = x ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. Grp -> E! u e. B A. x e. B ( ( u .+ x ) = x /\ ( x .+ u ) = x ) ) |
